questions.id: Around how many servings of vegetables (not including potatoes) did you eat during this meal/snack? 1 serving = 1/2 cup or half of a fistful.
questions.question: Around how many servings of vegetables (not including potatoes) did you eat during this meal/snack? 1 serving = 1/2 cup or half of a fistful.

questions.id: Around how many servings of fruit (not including fruit juice) did you eat during this meal/snack? 1 serving = 1 cup or a fistful-size or a medium-sized apple, banana, or orange.
questions.question: Around how many servings of fruit (not including fruit juice) did you eat during this meal/snack? 1 serving = 1 cup or a fistful-size or a medium-sized apple, banana, or orange.

questions.question: Did you eat any of the following during this meal or snack?
options: Sugar or honey (include any added to your drinks)
Chocolate or other types of candy
Sweets (like donuts, cake, cookies, pie, brownies)
Ice cream or other frozen dessert

questions.id: Select all beverages that you drank during your meal/snack
questions.question: Select all beverages that you drank during your meal/snack
options: Other calorie-free beverage (e.g., diet soda, tea, black coffee)
Caloric beverage (e.g., regular soda, juice, coffee w/ cream)

questions.id: Select any statements that apply to you. During this meal or snack, I....
questions.question: Select any statements that apply to you. During this meal or snack, I....
options: Was restricting my eating in order to control my weight
Felt like I couldn't stop eating, even if I wanted to
Ate much more quickly than usual
Felt guilty about what or how much I ate
None of these statements apply to me

questions.id: Select any statements that apply to you. When I started this meal or snack, I....
questions.question: Select any statements that apply to you. When I started this meal or snack, I....
options: Had a craving for a food I especially like
Did not feel physically hungry but still wanted to eat
None of these statements apply to me
